Name: Susesi Luxury Resort
Description:
This establishment is a high-quality beach hotel, which offers excellent facilities in a beachfront setting. It is highly modern with an elegant, water-themed design and a relaxing, homely atmosphere. Families and couples alike are welcomed here for a memorable holiday on the Mediterranean coast. Younger guests can make use of the children's playground and kids' club. There is also a choice of bars, pub, disco and restaurants on the premises. Conference facilities are available to business travellers and all guests can benefit from the WLAN Internet access at the hotel. Rooms are furnished and decorated with a modern touch and come with an en suite bathroom and a balcony or terrace. The hotel offers an extensive selection of leisure facilities and activity programmes.Hotels room;

Deluxe land: Shower Only
Deluxe sea: Shower Only
Deluxe superior land: Shower Only
Deluxe super pool: Shower Only
Senior Suite land and sea: 1 shower - 1 bathtub
